name: Brain Boost: Beta Wave
description:
A brain exercising game in the style of Brain Age that was developed by Dr. Makoto Shichida of Newport University of Japan that was developed with another Brain Boost game, Gamma Wave, which are both designed to stimulate the players right side of their brain.

There are two games to choose from: Training and Challenge with five different games that depend on accuracy and speed to choose from: Matching, Addition, Shape Recognition, Remembering Sequences and Moving Dots with multiple choice of four answers to choose from. Players are awarded points for correct answers and bonus points for answering them before a time limit.

Each game contains four stages with 20 problems a piece, advancing through the levels by completing a certain percentage of answers (50% in Training mode and 60% in Challenge mode) and keep track their development throughout the game.
